member.name: T:BedTimeStory.App
member.summary: Class representing the cross-platform application.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.App.#ctor(BedTimeStory.IAppService)
member.summary: Initializes the application.
member.param: The service used by the application.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.App.OnStart
member.summary: Invoked when the application starts.
member.remarks: This method is called when the application is launched. It overrides the base class's method to perform necessary initialization tasks for the application. It calls the OnStartAsync method of the associated instance asynchronously.

member.name: T:BedTimeStory.AppService
member.summary: Represents a service responsible for initializing and managing various application components. We use this in favor of the base class to migrate the databases on app start and to initialize the connection to App Center for error logging.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.AppService.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Initializes the application.
member.param: The service provider to retrieve registered services.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.AppService.OnStartAsync
member.summary: The method used for - Performing the initial download of the ifu - Redirecting to the Login screen. - Setting the default culture

member.name: T:BedTimeStory.IAppService
member.summary: Interface of the service with method for starting the service asynchronously.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.IAppService.OnStartAsync
member.summary: Performs necessary actions to start the application service asynchronously.
member.returns: An awaitable task.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.Components.UiFunctionality.Navigation.Views.BaseView.OnLoaded(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Trigger the view appearing event as soon as the view is loaded.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.Components.UiFunctionality.Navigation.Views.BaseView.OnBackButtonPressed
member.summary: Handles the back button tap. Prevents the back navigation, if defined in the corresponding view model.
member.returns: A value indicating whether back navigation was handled.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.Components.UiFunctionality.Navigation.Views.BaseView.OnAppearing
member.summary:
Despite the naming is triggered before the view is loaded, thus we use it for the initialization of the view model and trigger the appearing event as soon as the view is actually loaded.
Using would also be an option, but it was called that early that in some cases it lead to having the previously view model still active.

member.name: M:BedTimeStory.Components.UiFunctionality.Navigation.Views.BaseView.OnDisappearing
member.summary: Handles the event when the page is being hidden or removed from the display.
